'''Henric''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This burly merchant sells wares for protecting yourself... Or dealing some damage.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Basic armor and weapons. Unique options include [Essence Interrupter](/essenceInterrupter/), [Shattered Vengeance](/shatteredVengeance/), [Physicker's Belt](/physickersBelt/), and [Swordsman's Bracers](/swordsmansBracers/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
